synopsis.text:
Unknown to his peers, Juusei Academy's brilliant programmer, Akemi Nakajima, harbors a dark secret. Using his exceptional skills, he has developed a software capable of summoning demons to exact vengeance on his tormentors. However, his plan backfires when the malevolent entities, Loki and Set, turn against him. His salvation comes in the form of Yumiko Shirasagi, a mysterious transfer student with a hidden affection for Akemi.

As Akemi and Yumiko navigate their complex past lives and burgeoning feelings, they must confront the chaos unleashed by the Digital Devil program. With the fate of the world hanging in the balance, they must stand together against the relentless onslaught of demons, sacrifices, and ultimate evil. Will they survive long enough to restore order, or will they fall victim to the very monsters Akemi sought to control? This thrilling anime, based on Aya Nishitani's Digital Devil Story: Megami Tensei novels, promises a suspenseful journey filled with action, romance, and supernatural intrigue.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
